QuestData.Title: Hero's Call: Dragonblight!
QuestData.Description: Volunteers are needed to aid the Silver Covenant forces in the Dragonblight as they attempt to counter the chaotic arcane energies that threaten to rip the land apart.$b$bThose skilled in fighting dragons and undead are greatly welcome.$b$BThose willing to answer the call should report to Archmage Modera at Stars' Rest in Dragonblight.
QuestData.LogDescription: Speak with the Image of Archmage Modera at Stars' Rest.
QuestData.RewardText: I've been expecting you, $c. We have much work to do, you and I.
